title: Black Madonna
lastfmSummary: Continuing the running theme of empty and meaningless success from “Social Cues”, "Black Madonna" describes both the beauty and the emptiness that comes with success and living a fast life. The video’s description reads: This piece, was composed with the intent of being. A question, or commentary. Humans throughout history, have experience fractures of heart, struggling with deep separation, shame and isolation. What is the depth of the pain Read more on Last.fm.
